CustomField.description: Max frequency in hours of 'background' fetching balance for any Payment Service e.g. if a page is loaded and the last time a balance was checked from now() is less than this value in hours, do not fetch a fresh balance
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Max frequency in hours of 'background' fetching balance for any Payment Service e.g. if a page is loaded and the last time a balance was checked from now() is less than this value in hours, do not fetch a fresh balance
CustomField.label: Payment Service Balance Max Freq
